mapper.select: SELECT gt.gift_id, gt.gift_num, pt.product_name, pt.product_no, pt.product_specs, pt.unit_quantity AS stockQuantity, gt.product_id FROM t_gift gt LEFT JOIN t_product pt ON pt.product_id = gt.product_id WHERE gt.gift_strategy_id= #{giftStrategyId}
SELECT ps.shop_id, sp.shop_name FROM t_param_shop ps LEFT JOIN t_shop sp ON sp.shop_id = ps.shop_id WHERE ps.param_type = 2 AND ps.param_id = #{giftStrategyId}
